text:
Stage III Adult Soft Tissue Sarcoma That Has Spread to Lymph Nodes (Advanced)
												                    Treatment of stage III adult soft tissue sarcoma that has spread to lymph nodes (advanced) may include the following:         -  Surgery (wide local excision) with lymphadenectomy. Radiation therapy may also be given after surgery.    - A clinical trial of surgery followed by chemotherapy.    - A clinical trial of regional hyperthermia therapy.
